titles.title: A bill to designate a segment of the Kings River in California as a wild and scenic river.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 3/20/1987--Introduced. Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Kings River, California, as a wild and scenic river. Authorizes appropriations.
